com.pokitdok

Class PokitDok

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokitdok.PokitDok

  • public class PokitDok
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the pokitdok-java client access library for the PokitDok APIs.

    The pokitdok-java library provides a concise means for applications written in Java (and related languages) to integrate functionality from the PokitDok health APIs. It handles user authentication, scoping for endpoints that require it, and parsing results.

    Basic usage example: 

        
        import java.util.HashMap;
        import java.util.Map;
        import com.pokitdok.*;
        import org.json.simple.*;

        public class PokitDokTest {
            public static void main(String argv[]) {
                PokitDok pd = new PokitDok("client_id", "client_secret");

                Map<String, String> query = new HashMap<String, String>();
                query.put("last_name", "Aya-ay");

                Map<String, Object> results = pd.providers(query);
                System.out.println((JSONArray) results.get("data"));
            }
        }
    For simplicity, pokitdok-java uses the json-simple library for parsing results.

        Constructor which accepts an API base URL to override the default provided in DEFAULT_API_BASE.
        Parameters:
        clientId - a PokitDok client ID
        clientSecret - a PokitDok client secret
        apiBase - a new base URL to connect to for API calls
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - usually implying a connectivity error reaching the platform server
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the platform server's response couldn't be parsed

      • apiUrl

        public static java.lang.String apiUrl(java.lang.String apiBase,
                                      java.lang.String endpoint,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
        Constructs and returns a URL for the specified endpoint. If parameters are passed in, these are attached to the URL with a URIBuilder.
        Parameters:
        apiBase - the base Platform url to use to construct the url
        endpoint - the PokitDok endpoint to invoke
        params - the params to attach to the url (usually for GET requests)
        Returns:
        the URL for the given endpoint and the list of parameters
